DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to study the specific elastance in ALI/ARDS patients during invasive mechanical ventilation.
DOC.brief_title: The Specific Elastance in Acute Lung Injury/Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ALI/ARDS) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In sedated and paralyzed ALI/ARDS patients, we studied the specific elastance and also, we compared the specific elastance to healthy subjects during invasive mechanical ventilation.
DOC.criteria: Stable ALI/ARDS patients during invasive mechanical ventilation Hemodynamic failure, pneumothorax
